description: Making Budgets and Aid Work (MBAW) supports different ministries in making budget and budget policies and procedures based in Ministry of Finance

subproject.description:
Output 1: Strengthened Budget Policy and Planning Processes 
Output 2: Strengthened Budget Formulation Processes
Output 3: Strengthened Budget Execution Processes
Output 4: Strengthened and reformed Budget Monitoring and Reporting
Output 5: Improved alignment and effectiveness of aid to support Afghanistan development goals and strategy
Output 6: Sustainable institutional-capacity built and retained within the Ministry of Finance and Line Ministries
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Making Budgets and Aid Work
